title: Teen who worked at Shrewsbury middle school arrested on child porn charges
author: Darin Zullo
bullets: Crime Investigators allegedly recovered several pornographic videos depicting children from York’s Snapchat account.
By Darin Zullo January 18, 2026 | 11:30 AM 2 minutes to read A Lunenburg man who worked at a Shrewsbury middle school was arrested Thursday on child pornography charges, according to authorities.

Aiden York, 19, has been charged with two counts of possession of child pornography and one count of dissemination of visual material of a child in a state of nudity or sexual conduct, Lunenburg police said in a statement.

title: Former Boston police superintendent sues department, says he was demoted for uncovering fraud
author: Darin Zullo
bullets: Local News The police department’s deputy superintendent allegedly uncovered hundreds of department-wide paid detail fraud violations.
The lawsuit alleges that Police Commissioner Michael Cox demoted the former superintendent after he uncovered fraud violations.
Craig F.
